General.Name: Shenzhen Huaqiang Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Huaqiang Industry Co., Ltd. operates as an electronic components distributor in China. The company is also involved in the distribution and supply chain management of integrated circuit, storage, devices, and various passive elements; publishing of electronic components supply and demand information; online transactions; and logistics distribution, financial supply chain, and data study activities. In addition, it develops and manages e-commerce service platform; and trades in electronic products. Shenzhen Huaqiang Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
